text: I did it using React Hooks and the Ant-Design library.
I'm using it for shopping cart management state in Function CRUD and Redux.
For shopping carts, it is possible to increase or decrease the number of products and delete products.
Also, if you have more than one item, you can sort by name, quantity, and price.
If there are no items in the cart, you will be notified, on the contrary, it is a confirmation before payment.
